statements: DELETE FROM trading_volume_trends WHERE volume > 100000 AND trade_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM market_data WHERE trade_id = 1001 AND symbol = 'AAPL';
DELETE FROM market_data WHERE id = 100 AND symbol = 'AAPL';
DELETE FROM trade_signals WHERE signal_type = 'BUY' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM trading_activity WHERE account_id = 100 AND symbol = 'AAPL' AND action = 'Buy';
DELETE FROM trader WHERE name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM trader WHERE age >= 35 AND membership_status = 'Premium';
